item.description:
¿Le gustaría hablar mas español? ¡Yo tambien!  Unase a nosotros para una conversación informal.  Nos reunimos a hablar español los miércoles cada dos semanas.

The next meeting is at Paneras.   We get together to speak Spanish every other Wednesday.  Please join us for some very informal conversation.

To help defray the cost of using Meetup.com, a voluntary $2 donation per meeting is appreciated.

Nos vemos la próxima vez,

Don
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the back section of the restaurant.

group.name: South Shore Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: SS Spanish Meetup @ Panera's in Braintree
